title: What is a Payment Gateway?
description: A payment gateway is a solution that allows businesses to process online payments securely. It is a vital bridge connecting customers, merchants, and financial institutions.

title: How does a Payment Gateway work?
description: Payment gateways facilitate worldwide online transactions. After order confirmation, SSL encrypts payment details, which pass through the merchant’s website to the chosen gateway and then to the merchant’s bank.

title: Why is Payment Gateway integration important?
description: E-commerce can only function with payment gateway integration. It enhances transaction efficiency and strengthens online security, establishing a foundation for trust and reliability in the digital market.
